thread.title: 21 Tweets That Are Pretty Much Married Life In A Nutshell
thread.title_full: 21 Tweets That Are Pretty Much Married Life In A Nutshell

author: Kelsey Borresen
title: 21 Tweets That Are Pretty Much Married Life In A Nutshell
text:
21 Tweets That Are Pretty Much Married Life In A Nutshell "71 percent of being married is just sighing." Yep, pretty much. ðŸ˜† By Kelsey Borresen 
A good marriage provides love, support, and companionship â€• oh, and plenty of comic relief , too. 
Below are 21 hilariously relatable tweets that capture the realities of married life in 140 characters or less. 1 Me: We got invited to two parties this weekend.Wife: Wow. We finally have friends.Me: Weâ€™re skipping both, right?Wife: Obviously. â€” James Breakwell (@XplodingUnicorn) February 20, 2017 2 My wife and I just finished an intense 6-month mediation to pick the movie we're going to fall asleep 10 minutes into. WIFE: We really need to think about sticking to our monthly budgetME: *feeding my pet octopus a bag of emeralds* I agree â€” Michael (@Home_Halfway) February 21, 2017 5 Marriage is like taking medicine. Sometimes it taste like candy and sometimes it taste awful but generally you know itâ€™s good for you. â€” Boyd's Backyardâ„¢ (@TheBoydP) February 18, 2017 6 â€” Dad and Buried (@DadandBuried) January 10, 2017 7 I love that cute married thing we do where he uses the last of the coffee creamer & I die a little inside. â€” Six Pack Mom (@Six_Pack_Mom) January 15, 2017 8 Wife: What are you wearing?Me: Just my underwear ðŸ˜‰Wife: So you still haven't done the laundry?ME: No I have not â€” Abam Droud (@AdamBroud) April 22, 2016 9 Marriage tip: you can't find anything because your wife moved it to the last place you'd look. [getting dressed to go out]WIFE: um, i think there's a hole in your shirtME: yeah, there are four holes, jen. that's how shirts are made â€” The Hype (@TheHyyyype) January 16, 2017 11 [After performing the Dirty Dancing lift at our wedding]ME: Well that sure impressed them!WIFE [gasping for breath] You're getting heavier me *walks into living room with 2 beers*wife *takes one* Thanks *my dog whimpers in her sleep* omg so cute*husband breathes in his sleep* SHUT THE FUCK UP ME: Hi, come get me. This house is weird and someone is snoring.MOM: Honey, for the last time you're not at a sleepover. You're married. â€” rachelle mandik (@rachelle_mandik) October 25, 2015 15 â€” Ol' Boo Cocky (@MondayPajamas) January 31, 2017 16 â€” Jennifer S. White (@yenniwhite) January 28, 2017 17 My wife and I did some role playing in the bedroom last night. She was Interior Designer and I was Furniture Mover. â€” Kent Graham (@KentWGraham) March 6, 2016 18 Me: You know, one nice thing about being snowed in all weekend is we haven't had to spend any money.Wife: (clicking add to cart) So nice. â€” Simon Holland (@simoncholland) January 8, 2017 19 Husband's asking "what else" I did today as tho eating an entire sleeve of Ritz crackers isn't noteworthy on its own. â€” Valerie (@ValeeGrrl) February 21, 2017 20 I'm no Christian Grey but from time to time I've been known to deviate from the grocery list my wife gives me.
